name: part_008
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Introduction of hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 Official Items.
Weiss Schwarz hololive production Booster Pack commercial.
Chugai Mining Co., Ltd. commercial showcasing anime merchandise and collaboration cafes.
Showcase of various hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 Official and Special Limited Items (Acrylic Keyholders, Clear Files, Dioramas, Cards, Pamphlets, Apparel).
Attention screen providing rules and guidelines for event attendees.
Weiss Schwarz Premium Booster hololive production promotional screen.
Further showcase of official merchandise, including card binders, trading cards, and stickers.
Repetition of the event attention and rules screen.
Promotional visual for hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 2.
Showcase of hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish performance items (Penlight, T-shirt, Towel).

subtitles.original: hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 OFFICIAL ITEMS
subtitles.english: hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 OFFICIAL ITEMS

subtitles.original: hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 SPECIAL LIMITED ITEMS
subtitles.english: hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 SPECIAL LIMITED ITEMS

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
subtitles.english: Weiss Schwarz!

subtitles.original: ホロライブプロダクションの
subtitles.english: With the hololive production

subtitles.original: ブースターパックでも、止まらないヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
subtitles.english: booster pack, Weiss Schwarz is unstoppable!

subtitles.original: ブースターパック ホロライブプロダクション、好評発売中！
subtitles.english: Booster Pack hololive production, now on sale!

subtitles.original: ブシロード！
subtitles.english: Bushiroad!

subtitles.original: アニメが大好きな中外鉱業コンテンツ部です！
subtitles.english: We are the Chugai Mining Content Department, and we love anime!

subtitles.original: アニメを楽しみたい！
subtitles.english: We want to enjoy anime!

subtitles.original: そんな想いでアニメグッズを企画開発してインターネットで販売しています！
subtitles.english: With that in mind, we plan, develop, and sell anime goods online!

subtitles.original: アニメとコラボしたカフェもやってます。
subtitles.english: We also run cafes in collaboration with anime.

subtitles.original: 最新情報はTwitterで！
subtitles.english: Check Twitter for the latest information!

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場の皆様へ
subtitles.english: Attention to all visitors

subtitles.original: マスクの着用にご協力ください
subtitles.english: Please cooperate by wearing a mask

subtitles.original: 携帯電話の電源はオフにせず マナーモードに設定してください
subtitles.english: Do not turn off your mobile phone; please set it to silent mode

subtitles.original: 撮影/録音/録画は禁止とさせていただきます
subtitles.english: Photography, recording, and filming are prohibited

subtitles.original: ライト・拍手で応援をお願いします
subtitles.english: Please show your support with lights and applause

subtitles.original: #つながるホロライブDAY2
subtitles.english: #LinkYourWishDAY2

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment until the performance begins
